root.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
root.description: In CSI: Crime Scene Investigation the player assumes the role of a forensic scientist tasked with finding and analyzing evidence to solve various murders. Throughout you are assisted by characters from the show, offering advice when the player becomes unsure of how to progress in the investigation. The show's cast members all lent their likenesses and voices to the game making it a rather authentic , if uninspiring experience.
